desc: Champion RC offers some of the highest quality RC Airplanes, Helicopters, Cars & Trucks on the market. We offer a wide variety of products, parts and accessories for all your hobby needs. Did we mention order by 2PM CST and receive same day shipping! Call us: (844) 492-4267

layout.text: The Traxxas 4X4 XMAXX VXL is packed with innovative engineering, even in the smallest details, to deliver a powerful and tough truck that’s all about speed, durability, and performance.
